attributes.action: stop the unfair price hikes in elctricity that consumers are still having to put up with despite oil prices dropping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a private consumer of electricity i have just recently received a letter from my energy supplier saying that they will have to increse our charges yet again. I find this rather puzzling and confusing given the huge drop in oil prices, this is a prime example of greed on the part of the supplier, and these companys should be regulated a bit better.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
